attributes.action: Allow gyms to re-open adhering to covid 19 measures
attributes.background: Restaurants and pubs are going to be opening again, which inevitably will increase consumption of alcohol and fast foods. It would be wrong under the given circumstances to keep gyms closed, when they can help to keep individuals healthy and fit.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition gyms have been allowed to reopen. You can read the Government's announcement about the reopening of gyms here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-gyms-and-pools-to-reopen-safely
